record.title: GRANTING MEMBERS OF THE HOUSE PRIVILEGE TO EXTEND REMARKS AND INCLUDE EXTRANEOUS MATERIAL IN THE CONGRESSIONAL RECORD DURING THE 110TH CONGRESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that during the 110th Congress, all Members be permitted to extend their remarks and to include extraneous material within the permitted limit in that section of the RECORD entitled "Extensions of Remarks."

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
